name: EXPAWLORER Anti Slip Dog Socks to Prevent Licking Paws, Dog Shoes for Hot Pavement, Dog Booties for Small Medium Large Senior Dogs, Traction Control Boots & Paw Protectors for Hardwood Floors
short_description: [Prevent From Licking] Our innovative dog socks are specially designed to help prevent your furry companion from licking their paws! These socks are an excellent solution for pet owners experiencing excessive paw licking due to allergies. These anti-lick dog socks are a must-have for any pet owner looking to enhance their dog's health and well-being. Say goodbye to sore, irritated paws for good!

[Double Side No-Skid] It's our patent-exclusive design, Each side of the sock has [21 Cute Little Paw Grips] to provide strong extra traction when your dog is walking on the smooth floor. Even if the socks twist, they will still work. It's good for active dogs, and If your senior dogs has problems who was splaying and keeps slipping on your wooden floors with their back legs, it can help your old friends walk around in the house again!

[Premium Material] Made of elastic and comfortable breathable knit fabric, It's soft and light, so dogs will easier to accept it, The durable bottom with extra-thick grip is specially crafted to shield your furry companion's paws from the hot and cold pavement, and rough outdoor surfaces. these socks create a protective barrier between your dog's paw pads and the ground, guarding against extreme temperatures and rugged terrain.

[Anti-Fall Off] Updated with wider and longer elastic sticky straps, there is more room for adjustment depending on your dog's feet, to prevent socks from falling off, greatly increase wearing comfort, and keep your socks safe from scratches in the wash, we’ve designed a removable sticky straps so you can easily take it off before washing.

name: Anti-Slip Dog Socks for Hardwood Floors, Non-Slip Socks with Reflective Strips to Provide Paw Protection, Reflective Grip Socks for Senior Dogs, Prevent Licking & Scratches, 6 PCS Set - M
short_description: MULTIPLE SIZE OPTIONS: Homcolorful dog socks come in 4 different size sets, including XS, S, M, and L, making them perfect for small to large breeds. For the best fit, measure your dog's paw width before purchasing—if it falls between two sizes, choose the larger size.

SUPERIOR ANTI-SLIP PERFORMANCE: Designed for hardwood and tile floors, these non-slip dog socks feature an oversized anti-slip grip area that provides excellent traction, effectively reducing the risk of slipping. These dog socks are especially beneficial for senior dogs or those with joint or mobility issues, offering stable support for pets with weak hind legs to move safely.

DOG SOCKS WITH REFLECTIVE STRIPS: Equipped with reflective strips, these nonslip dog socks enhance visibility in low-light or nighttime conditions, keeping your pet safer during indoor and outdoor activities. Whether walking in a dimly lit room or stepping out briefly at night, the reflective design improves recognition and reduces collision risks.

VERSATILE PROTECTION: These multi-purpose dog socks are ideal for both indoor and outdoor use. Whether protecting paws from hot pavement in summer or icy surfaces in winter, dog socks with grippers shield against sharp objects, cold surfaces, and harsh weather conditions. Additionally, anti-slip dog socks help prevent furniture scratches, keep paws clean by blocking dust and dirt, and protect floors from damage—perfect for small and large dogs who love to play all year round.

SOFT, BREATHABLE & COMFORTABLE: Made from stretchy, breathable cotton, these dog socks provide maximum comfort and flexibility. They also help prevent paw licking and chewing, promoting better recovery for your furry friend.
